title: Selling Old Judge N172 BOBBY MATHEWS No.296-2 SGC 50
author: Misunderestimated

posts.post_title: Selling Old Judge N172 BOBBY MATHEWS No.296-2 SGC 50
posts.post_content:
Nice card and nice image of the 297 game winner* from baseball's infancy -- Mathews last season was 1887. He is considered a "scarce" player in the set.
See OJ "Bible" at p.93.ards of Mathews do not come up for sale very often.
Anyway its for sale (reluctantly) for $1600. 
If you are interested please email me at [url]bhodes@rcn.com[/url]
The first to accept terms gets the card....Paypal accepted without surcharge.
--
Includes National Assn Totals which is a subject of  dispute in the land of the sabermetric-statheads.
